toc-how-do-i-use-ethereum: Ta ya zan yi amfani da Ethereum?
toc-learn-about-the-ethereum-community: Koyi game da al'umma na Ethereum
hero-subtitle: Jagorar iliminku ga duniyar Ethereum. Koyi yadda Ethereum ke aiki da yadda ake haɗa shi. Wannan shafin ya ƙunshi labarai na fasaha da marasa fasaha, jagorori, da albarkatu.
what-is-crypto-1: Wataƙila kun ji labarin kuɗaɗen kiripto, blockchain da Bitcoin. Hanyoyin haɗin da ke ƙasa zasu taimake ka ka koyi abin da suke da kuma yadda suke da alaka da Ethereum.
what-is-crypto-2: Kuɗin kiripto, kamar bitcoin, yana bawa kowa damar canja wurin kuɗi a duniya. Ethereum ma yana yi, amma kuma yana iya gudanar da lambar da ke baiwa mutane damar ƙirƙirar ƙa'idodi da ƙungiyoyi. Yana da duka juriya da sassauƙa: kowane shirin kwamfuta na iya gudana akan Ethereum. Ƙara koyo kuma gano yadda ake farawa:
what-is-ethereum-card-description: Idan ku sababbi ne, fara daga nan don sanin dalilin da yasa Ethereum ke da mahimmanci.
what-is-ethereum-card-image-alt: Hoton wani mutum a cikin tsakiyar kasuwa mai shaguna, wanda ke nuni da Ethereum.
what-is-eth-description: Ether (ETH) shine kuɗin da ke ba da damar cibiyar sadarwar Ethereum da manhajoji.
what-is-web3-card-description: Duniyar gizo3 wani samfuri ne don intanet yana ƙimanta ikon mallakar kadarorin ku da asalin ku.
additional-reading-more-on-ethereum-basi: Ƙari kan matakin farko na Ethereum
guides-hub-desc: Jagorori: umarnin mataki-mataki kan yadda ake amfani da Ethereum
quiz-hub-desc: Cibiyar Tambayoyi: yi gwaji wa ilimin ku
additional-reading-ethereum-in-thirty-mi: Ethereum cikin minti 30 na Vitalik Buterin
additional-reading-get-eth: Koyi yadda za ku samu ETH
how-do-i-use-ethereum-1: Amfani da Ethereum na nufin damarmaki da yawa ga mutane da yawa. Ƙila kana son shiga wani manhaja ko ka tabbatar da zamanka yanar gizo ko kuma aika kuɗin kiripto to ETH. Farkon abun yi shi ne samun akawunt. Mafi sauri da sauƙin hanyan mallakar asusu shi ne ta hanyar amfani da manhajar mai suna wallet.
what-is-a-wallet-card-description: Walet ɗin dijital kamar walat ɗin gaske ne; suna adana abin da kake buƙata don tabbatar da asalin ka kuma su sami damar zuwa wuraren da kake ƙima.
find-a-wallet-card-description: Ka duba walat ta fanin abubuwan da ke da muhimmanci gare ku.
crypto-security-basics-card-description: Koyi yadda zaka gane zamba da daƙile duk wasu dabarorin ta.
things-to-consider-banner-title: Abin da Yakamata ka sani yayin amfani da Ethereum
things-to-consider-banner-1: Duk wani cinikayya na Ethereum na bukatan wasu ɗan kuɗin irin ETH, ko da zamu matsar dashi ne daga wurare daban-daban wanda Ethereum suka gina kamar tsayayyun silala irin USDC ko DAI.
things-to-consider-banner-2: Kuɗi zai iya yawa saboda yawan mutanen da ke ƙoƙarin amfani da Ethereum, mu na bada shawaran amfani da
additional-reading-layer-2: Hawa na 2: rage yawan kuɗin cinikayya
what-is-ethereum-used-for-1: Ethereum ya haifar da ƙirƙirar sababbin samfurori da ayyuka waɗanda za su iya inganta sassa daban-daban na rayuwarmu. Har yanzu muna kan matakin farko amma akwai abubuwa da yawa da za a yi farin ciki da su.
defi-card-description: Bincika madadin tsarin kuɗi wanda aka ginawa ba tare da bankuna ba kuma yana buɗe wa kowa.
stablecoins-card-description: Kuɗin kiripto sun danganta da ƙimar kuɗi, kayayyaki, ko wasu kayan aikin kuɗi.
nft-card-description: Na waƙiltar mallakar abubuwa na musamman, daga fasaha zuwa Takardun mallaka zuwa tikitin shagali.
dao-card-description: Samar da sabbin hanyoyin tsara aiki ba tare da taimakon sugaba ba.
dapp-card-title: Manhajoji da ke cin gashin kansu (dapps)
dapp-card-description: Ƙirƙiri tattalin arziƙin dijital na ayyukan wane-zuwa-wane.
emerging-use-cases-description: Hakanan akwai wasu manyan masana'antu waɗanda aka ƙirƙira ko inganta su tare da Ethereum:
fundraising-through-quadratic-funding: Tara kuɗaɗe ta hanyar Tallafin Quadratic
more-on-ethereum-use-cases: Ƙarin bayani game da lamuran amfani da Ethereum
more-on-ethereum-use-cases-link: Blockchain a cikin ƙasashe masu tasowa
strengthening-the-ethereum-network-descr: Za ka iya taimakawa wajen ƙare Ethereum kuma ka samu kyauta a lokaci guda ta hanyar saka hannun jari ETH na ka. Akwai zaɓuɓɓuka daban-daban don saka hannun jari dangane da ilimin fasahar ka da nawa ETH kana da shi.
staking-ethereum-card-description: Koyi yadda za ka adana Ethereum ɗin ka.
run-a-node-card-description: Yi aiki mai mahimmanci a cikin hanyar sadarwa na Ethereum ta hanyar gudanar da node.
learn-about-ethereum-protocol-descriptio: Ga masu asusun da suka fi sha'awar sashin fasaha na cibiyar sadarwar Ethereum.
energy-consumption-card-description: Nawaadadin ƙarfin da Ethereum ke amfani da shi?
energy-consumption-card-button: Shin Ethereum na da kyau wajen yanayin muhalli?
ethereum-upgrades-card-description: Taswirar hanyar Ethereum ta sa ta fi faɗaɗuwa, amintacce, kuma da ɗorewa.
ethereum-whitepaper-card-description: Asalin takarda Ethereum wanda Vitalik Buterin ya rubuta a cikin shekarar 2024.
more-on-ethereum-protocol-consensus: Ethereum ta hujja-na-hannun jari a tushen yanayin yarjejeniya inji'
more-on-ethereum-protocol-nodes-and-clie: Cibiyar Ethereum da kuma abokin ciniki
ethereum-community-description: Nasarar Ethereum godiya ce ga al'ummarsa masu sadaukarwa. Dubban mutane masu ban sha'awa da ra'ayi suna taimakawa ci gaba da hangen nesa na Ethereum, yayin da suna samar da tsaro ga cibiyar sadarwa ta hanyar saka hannun jari da mulki. Ku zo ku kasance tare da mu!
community-hub-card-description: Al'ummar mu ta ƙunshi mutane daga kowane fage.
get-involved-card-description: Ana maraba da kai(e, kai!) don ba da gudummawa ga al'ummar ethereum.
online-communities-card-description: Al'ummomi na kan da intanet suna ba da dama don yin ƙarin takamaiman tambayoyi ko shiga ciki.
proof-of-stake-description: 13 ga Satumba, 2022 - Vitalik Buterin, Nathan Schneider
mastering-ethereum-description: 23 ga Disamba, 2018 – Andreas M. Antonopoulos, Gavin Wood Ph.D.
bankless-description: Jagora zuwa hada-hadar kuɗi na Kiripto
zeroknowledge-description: Babu sanarwa da bayani da zai samar da ƙarfi da zai watsa shafin intanet da gina al'umma a wannan
green-pill-description: Binciken tsarin tattalin arzikin kiripto-da ke haifar da kyakkyawan tasiri a duniya
unchained-description: Yana zurfafawa cikin mutanen da ke gina intanet mai rarrabuwa, cikakkun bayanai game da wannan fasaha wanda zai iya tallafawa rayuwarmu na gaba, da kuma wasu batutuwa masu mahimmanci a cikin kiripto, kamar ka'idoji, tsaro da sirri
the-daily-gwei-description: Taƙaitattun labarai, sabuntawa, da bincike na Ethereum
